title: Project-Based Learning Course for Strengthening Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environments using digital devices (tablets/laptops), and evening/weekend class operations for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can convert real-world work problems into mathematical modeling and derive solutions
Learners can collaborate with project team members to visually represent data analysis results using visual tools and present them
Learners can record misconceptions discovered during the learning process in a reflective journal and establish improvement plans
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
